Class ParserUtils

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.draft2010.components.parser.ParserUtils

public class ParserUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class defining some helpful methods for parser.

Sven Krosse

Method Detail

containsTokens

public static boolean containsTokens(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                     java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>... tokensToFound)
Method checks if there is a token of the given collection contained in the other token list. Only a token which are part of the expression and not cramped.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the token list
tokensToFound - the tokens to look for
Returns:
true if the token is contained in a non-protected section, false otherwise.

containsTokens

public static boolean containsTokens(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                     java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tokensToFound)
Method checks if there is a token of the given collection contained in the other token list. Only a token which are part of the expression and not cramped.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the token list
tokensToFound - the tokens to look for
Returns:
true if the token is contained in a non-protected section, false otherwise.

containsTokens

public static boolean containsTokens(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                     java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tokensToFound,
                                     java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionStarts,
                                     java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionEnds)
Method checks if there is a token of the given collection contained in the other token list. Only a tokens which are part of the expression and not contained by a protected section

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the token list
tokensToFound - the tokens to look for
protectionStarts - a set of tokens which indicates the beginning of a protected section
protectionEnds - a set of tokens which indicates the end of a protected section
Returns:
true if the token is contained in a non-protected section, false otherwise.

indexOfTokens

public static int indexOfTokens(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>... tokensToFound)
Method checks if there is a token of the given collection contained in the other token list. Only a token which are part of the expression and not cramped.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the token list
tokensToFound - the tokens to look for
Returns:
the index of found token or -1 if no token was found

split

public static void split(IParserUtilsCallback callback,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokens,
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> delimers,
                         boolean ignoreDelimer)
                  throws TMQLGeneratorException,
                         TMQLInvalidSyntaxException
Method splits the given token chain at each position of the given delimers. If a delimer is found the callback will be informed.

Parameters:
callback - the handler of a found delimer
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
tokens - the string-represented tokens to split
delimers - the set of delimer tokens
ignoreDelimer - indicates if the delimer should be a part add to sub lists
Throws:
TMQLGeneratorException - , TMQLInvalidSyntaxException redirect from the IParserUtilsCallback
TMQLInvalidSyntaxException

split

public static void split(IParserUtilsCallback callback,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokens,
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> delimers,
                         boolean ignoreDelimer,
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionStarts,
                         java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionEnds)
                  throws TMQLGeneratorException,
                         TMQLInvalidSyntaxException
Method splits the given token chain at each position of the given delimers. If a delimer is found the callback will be informed.

Parameters:
callback - the handler of a found delimer
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
tokens - the string-represented tokens to split
delimers - the delimer tokens
ignoreDelimer - indicates if the delimer should be a part add to sub lists
protectionStarts - a set of tokens which indicates the beginning of a protected section
protectionEnds - a set of tokens which indicates the end of a protected section
Throws:
TMQLGeneratorException - , TMQLInvalidSyntaxException redirect from the IParserUtilsCallback
TMQLInvalidSyntaxException

indizes

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indizes(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>... keys)
Method returns a list containing each index of the given token. Tokens as part of the protected section will be ignored.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
keys - as key tokens which should be looked for
Returns:
a list of all indexes

indizes

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indizes(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> keys)
Method returns a list containing each index of the given token. Tokens as part of the protected section will be ignored.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
keys - as key tokens which should be looked for
Returns:
a list of all indexes

indizes

public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indizes(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> keys,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionStarts,
                                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionEnds)
Method returns a list containing each index of the given token. Tokens as part of the protected section will be ignored.

Parameters:
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
keys - as key tokens which should be looked for
protectionStarts - a set of tokens which indicates the beginning of a protected section
protectionEnds - a set of tokens which indicates the end of a protected section
Returns:
a list of all indexes

getEmbedQueries

public static void getEmbedQueries(IParserUtilsCallback callback,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokens)
                            throws TMQLGeneratorException,
                                   TMQLInvalidSyntaxException
Method extracts the embed queries of the given expression. The embed queries will be detected by the angle brackets '{' and '}' but only if they are not contained by a embed-query too.

Parameters:
callback - the handler of a found embed query
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
Throws:
TMQLGeneratorException - , TMQLInvalidSyntaxException redirect from the IParserUtilsCallback
TMQLInvalidSyntaxException

getEmbedQueries

public static void getEmbedQueries(IParserUtilsCallback callback,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> tmqlTokens,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokens,
                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionStarts,
                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IToken>> protectionEnds)
                            throws TMQLGeneratorException,
                                   TMQLInvalidSyntaxException
Method extracts the embed queries of the given expression. The embed queries will be detected by the angle brackets '{' and '}' but only if they are not contained by a embed-query too.

Parameters:
callback - the handler of a found embed query
tmqlTokens - the language-specific tokens to split
protectionStarts - a set of tokens which indicates the beginning of a protected section
protectionEnds - a set of tokens which indicates the end of a protected section
Throws:
TMQLGeneratorException - , TMQLInvalidSyntaxException redirect from the IParserUtilsCallback
TMQLInvalidSyntaxException
